31. $y=\cfrac{x-2}{|x^2-2x|}=\cfrac{x-2}{|x||x-2|}=\begin{cases} \cfrac{1}{x},\ x>2,\\ -\cfrac{1}{x},\ 0<x<2,\\ \cfrac{1}{x},\ x<0. \end{cases}$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task031-solution-fig1}
